title: Bug 110566: Wrong data set result returned when an invalid filter expression 'row[0]' is set
description: When setting a filter expression in the data set as 'row[0] equals to 0', the result set is incorrect or returns null.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0' and clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned.
EB: As the developer mentioned, 'row[0]' can only be generated after all the data has been fetched and cannot be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the data set and set a filter with the expression 'row[0] equals to 0'.
2. Click on the Preview tab.

Expected behavior: The result record should not be returned or should be null due to the invalid filter expression.
